sqlMap.select: select * from (select row_number() over (order by notice_no asc) row_numbers notice_no as no, notice_post_no as postNo, notice_send_emp_no as sendEmpNo, notice_receive_emp_no as receiveEmpNo, notice_content as content, notice_reading_status as readingStatus, notice_deleted as deleted, notice_created_date as createdDate, notice_updated_date as updatedDate, notice_deleted_date as deletedDate from comm_post_notices where notice_receive_emp_no = #empNo#) where row_numbers between #begin# and #end#

select * from (select row_number() over (order by p.post_created_date asc) row_numbers, p.post_no as no, p.post_board_no as boardNo, b.board_name as boardName, p.post_title as title, p.post_writer_no as writerNo, p.post_created_date as createdDate, p.post_read_count as readCount, p.post_suggestion_count as suggestionCount, p.post_content as content, e.emp_name as writerName from comm_posts p, comm_employees e, comm_boards b where post_writer_no = #empNo# and p.post_writer_no = e.emp_no and b.board_no = p.post_board_no and p.post_deleted = 'N'
and p.post_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and p.post_content like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
) where row_numbers between #begin# and #end#

select * from (select row_number() over (order by comment_created_date asc) row_numbers, comment_no as no, comment_emp_no as empNo, comment_content as content, comment_deleted as deleted, comment_created_date as createdDate, comment_updated_date as updatedDate, comment_deleted_date as deletedDate, comment_post_no as postNo from comm_post_comments where comment_emp_no = #empNo#) where row_numbers between #begin# and #end#

select count(*) from comm_posts where post_writer_no = #empNo# and post_deleted = 'N'
and post_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and post_content like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
select count(*) from comm_post_notices where notice_receive_emp_no = #empNo# and notice_reading_status = 'N' and notice_deleted = 'N'
select count(*) from comm_post_comments where comment_emp_no = #empNo# and comment_deleted = 'N'
select count(*) from comm_posts where post_writer_no = #empNo# and post_deleted = 'N'

select e.emp_no as empNo, e.emp_created_date as createdDate, d.department_name as deptName, p.position_name as positionName, e.emp_name as name, e.emp_phone as phone, e.emp_email as email from comm_employees e, comm_departments d, comm_positions p where e.emp_dept_no = d.department_no and e.emp_position_no = p.position_no and emp_no = #value#
